question:
There is a new mature tourism park in my town called Panorama Kedah Tempunak. The park is located in Tempunak    Kapuas village. It only takes thirty minutes from my house by motorcycle to go there. It is a very big park, with colorful
flowers everywhere. There are also many fruit plants, such as papayas, rambutans, rose apples, and dragon fruits. In
the middle of the park, there is a big lake. ive can explore the lake by using small duck-like boats. Next to the lake, there
is a grassy landscape that makes the park looks green and fertile. The park has some outdoor benches and hammocks
where we can sit and enjoy the view while eating snacks and drink. The park is really worth a visit.
36. What can we find in Panorama Kedah Tempunak?
A indoor benches
B. small river
C. friendly villagers
D. grassy landscape
37. How long does it take to go there from the writer house?
A. 20 minutes
B. 25 minutes
C.30 minutes
D. 35 minutes
38 Which statement is NOT TRUE about the park based on the text above?
A. There is a big lake in the middle of the park
C. there are lion-shape boats in the lake.
B. There are many fruit plants in the park
D. the park is located in Tempunak​

answers.answer:

related_questions.question: Suatu segitiga siku-siku yang panjang sisinya a 8 cm dan b 15 cm panjang sisi c nya adalah​

answers.answer:
Penjelasan:

Segitiga siku-siku adalah segitiga yang besar sudut pada sisi tegak lurusnya adalah 90°. Pada segitiga siku-siku berlaku teorema Pythagoras yang berbunyi besar kuadrat sisi miringnya sama dengan jumlah kuadrat dua sisi siku-sikunya.

Ingat!!!

Rumus teorema Pythagoras

c² = a² + b²

Diketahui:

panjang sisi siku-siku 1 = a = 15 cm

panjang sisi siku-siku 2 = b = 8 cm

Ditanya: berapa panjang sisi miring segitiga siku-siku tersebut?

Jawab:

Pada soal diketahui panjang sisi siku-siku 1 = a = 15 cm dan panjang sisi siku-siku 2 = b = 8 cm

Maka penyelesaian dari soal di atas menggunakan teorema Pythagoras.

c² = a² + b²

c² = (15 cm)² + (8 cm)²

c² = 225 cm² + 64 cm²

c² = 289 cm²

c = √(289 cm²) = 17 cm

Jadi, panjang sisi miring segitiga siku-siku yang panjang sisi siku-sikunya 15 cm dan 8 cm adalah 17 cm.

Teorema Phytagoras =

  • [tex] \sqrt{ {8}^{2} } + {15}^{2} = [/tex]
  • [tex] \sqrt{64 + 225} = [/tex]
  • [tex] \sqrt{289} = [/tex]
  • 17 cm
  • Jadi, panjang c ( sisi miring ) = 17 cm

Semoga membantu.. Jangan dihapus jawaban saya... =)

c.eats grass and gives wool 
d.eats carrot and gives meat 
tolong dijawaba​

11.Nanda and her brother ... at five o'clock every morning.    a. woke up
b. wake up
c. waking up
12. The students ... study online in 2019.
a. Do not
b. did not
c. were not
13. Junercho ... the film until 10 pm every night
a. Watches
b. watch
C. watched
14. Dewa wanted to be a teacher when he ... a child.
b. do
c. am
15. Does your father ... to work early in the morning?
a. go
b. went
C. gone
16.Tiger and lion ... the heaviest land animal.
a. is not
b. are not
C. do not
a. was​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

11. B. Wake up.

12. A. Do not.

13. A. Watches.

14. Was.

15. A. Go.

16. B. Are not.

Penjelasan:

Nomor 11-16 menggunakan kalimat Simple Present Tense, kecuali nomor 14 menggunakan kalimat Simple Past Tense.

related_questions.question: Change the sentences into negative and interrogative a. my mother always give mea a present for my birthday b. he knew the answer off the question c. rudi and anto arema playing badminton now

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. - My mother never gives me a present for my birthday?

? Does your mother give you a present for your birthday?

2. - He didn't know the answer of the question

? Did he know the answer of the question?

3. - Rudi and Anto are not playing badminton now

? Are they playing badminton now?

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^
